Steps.Message: Update at 22:06 - Hi, this is James from the UK Power Networks messaging team. Thanks for your patience over tonight. Further engineers are on the way to assist with heavy lifting and repairs to the underground fault. To give them time to do this safely, the estimated timeframe to restore your power is now between 23:00 and 00:00. We're sorry this is taking longer than expected, and we'll continue to keep you up to date, but if any change to this time comes in from our staff I'll let you know as soon as we hear.

We became aware of a power cut at 19:26. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 22:06 - Hi, this is James from the UK Power Networks messaging team. Thanks for your patience over tonight. Further engineers are on the way to assist with heavy lifting and repairs to the underground fault. To give them time to do this safely, the estimated timeframe to restore your power is now between 23:00 and 00:00. We're sorry this is taking longer than expected, and we'll continue to keep you up to date, but if any change to this time comes in from our staff I'll let you know as soon as we hear.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on a piece of our electrical equipment which controls the power to your home.
